growth-rate.Note: (a) Data from 2001 to 2011 are based on the Census of Population and Housing-2001 (b) Data from 2012 onwards are based on the Census of Population and Housing-2012
growth-rate.Update frequency: twelve weeks after the relevant year

crude-birth-rate-all-island.Note: For 2010 and 2011 figures are based on place of occurrence.From 2012 onwards,figures are based on usual place of residence.

crude-death-rate-all-island.Note: For 2010 and 2011 figures are based on place of occurrence.From 2012 onwards,figures are based on usual place of residence.
